channel.title: Microscopic properties of a material
channel.description: Hey. I'm looking to find the microscopic properties of a super-alloy called [b]Nimonic[/b], but I can't find any information about it. Could someone please help me out? Just a link to some information would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: Microscopic properties of a material
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:5, topic:535341”]Here is a paper on nimonic I co-authored - http://lab.fs.uni-lj.si/lanem/clanki/brojan/MMP_2009.pdf

The focus was on the evolution of the microstructure of nimonic, so I think it’s very similar to what you’re researching. We concluded that when the strain rate is increased or when the temperature decreased the apex of stress is shifted to a higher strain. Let me know if you need any more information or the datasets we used.[/quote]

That’s really useful - thankyou!

Read full topic

item.title: Microscopic properties of a material
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

Here is a paper on nimonic I co-authored - http://lab.fs.uni-lj.si/lanem/clanki/brojan/MMP_2009.pdf

The focus was on the evolution of the microstructure of nimonic, so I think it’s very similar to what you’re researching. We concluded that when the strain rate is increased or when the temperature decreased the apex of stress is shifted to a higher strain. Let me know if you need any more information or the datasets we used.

Read full topic

item.title: Microscopic properties of a material
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

I’ve had a look at both of those resources in the past (I have around 200 pages printed on the alloy) but I need to know about the microproperties of it, they only really talk about the macroproperties

Read full topic
